subtitleNullable: Malaysia biggest online news collection on Kaggle
descriptionNullable:
The Star is a a well-known Malaysian news website and newspaper. It provides coverage of various topics including national news, politics, business, sports, entertainment, lifestyle, and more. The Star is one of the most widely circulated English-language newspapers in Malaysia and has a significant online presence through its website.
This dataset contains news articles from The Star Malaysia, including titles, text, sections, categories, authors, published dates, keywords, summaries, URLs, and top images. It covers a variety of topics such as nation, technology, and crime, with articles ranging from short news briefs to long-length news.
